Bill de hOra wrote:
>
>
> Kris Zyp wrote:
>
> > The elegance of JSON in a REST architecture is that JSON implicitly
> > provides link relations. I am skeptical that we need yet another link
> > relation mechanism in addition to the natural links are already
> > defined by JSON itself.
>
> This assumption was a huge mistake in the XML community; I hope JSON
> users aren't doing the same thing.

It is mistake in XML. And it would be an even bigger mistake to think
the same rules apply in JSON.

Hyperbole aside, perhaps you have some technical arguments for this
feeling that we could discuss?

Thanks,
Kris
